Send Messages Anywhere

QuickMessage is a solid and simple messenger that keeps you connected with your friends and family. Send a message from Linux to Windows or Windows to Mac.with NO signup, NO registration and NO cost!

Just need a LAN

As long as your pc is connected with other pc's on your network, you can send them messages. You can start to chat right away after you download. QuickMessage automatically detects your network and finds your peers.

Theme

QuickMessage comes with several beautiful prebuilt themes. Just choose it!

Portable

No installation or mess up with your computer settings. Just download, extract and run. Of course you can run from a USB too.
